channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 22 Very Online Upstarts Changing the Face of Politics
item.description: Introducing WIRED’s 2025 Political Power Users—the creators, podcasters, and pundits who will blow up the next electoral era.

item.title: The World’s Oceans Are Hurtling Toward Breaking Point
item.description: Climate change, pollution, and fishing are pushing oceans closer to their limits at an unprecedented rate. The pressure of that human impact is expect...

item.title: How Al Gore used AI to track 660M polluters
item.description: A new tool from Climate Trace allows people to track the path of fine particulate matter, or PM2.5, which causes as many as 10 million deaths annually...

item.title: For One Glorious Morning, a Website Saved San Francisco From Parking Tickets
item.description: The serial website builder Riley Walz launched a project that tracked San Francisco parking enforcement in real time—until the public data feed was cu...

item.title: Logitech Signature Solar Slim+ K980 Keyboard Review: See the Light
item.description: Logitech's latest full-size office keyboard has no USB port and is powered purely by ambient light.

item.title: What is Bluesky? Everything to know about the X competitor
item.description: We’ve compiled the answers to some of the most common questions users have about Bluesky.

item.title: Google’s AI Mode arrives in Spanish globally
item.description: Google's AI Mode is now available to Spanish-speaking users worldwide.

item.title: OpenAI Teams Up With Oracle and SoftBank to Build 5 New Stargate Data Centers
item.description: The new sites will boost Stargate’s planned capacity to nearly 7 gigawatts—about equal to the output of seven large nuclear reactors.

item.title: OpenAI is building five new Stargate data centers with Oracle and SoftBank
item.description: OpenAI is continuing to build out massive AI data centers to train and serve increasingly powerful AI models.
